schemas.name: store
schemas.description: Contains data related to customers, orders, and products within the store ecosystem. Use this schema for analyzing customer behavior, order trends, and product performance.

tables.name: customer
tables.description: Holds information about all registered customers, including contact details and account status.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each customer.

columns.name: CustomerName
columns.description: Full name of the customer.

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Email address associated with the customer.

columns.name: PhoneNumber
columns.description: Contact phone number of the customer.

columns.name: PrimaryAddress
columns.description: Main residential or shipping address of the customer.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when the customer record was created.

columns.name: CustomerType
columns.description: Category or type of customer, e.g., 'Retail' or 'Wholesale'.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the customer account is currently active.

tables.name: orderinfo
tables.description: Contains general information about customer orders, including status, payment, and shipping details.

columns.name: OrderID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each order.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer who placed the order.

columns.name: OrderDate
columns.description: Date when the order was placed.

columns.name: ShippingDate
columns.description: Date when the order was shipped.

columns.name: OrderStatus
columns.description: Current status of the order, e.g., 'Pending', 'Shipped', or 'Delivered'.

columns.name: TotalAmount
columns.description: Total monetary amount for the order.

columns.name: PaymentMethod
columns.description: Payment method used for the order, e.g., 'Credit Card' or 'PayPal'.

columns.name: ShippingAddress
columns.description: Address where the order is to be delivered.

tables.name: orderdetails
tables.description: Contains detailed information about individual items within each order, including product, quantity, and pricing details.

columns.name: OrderDetailID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each order line item.

columns.name: OrderID
columns.description: Identifier linking this record to the main order.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Identifier for the product included in this order line.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Number of units of the product ordered.

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Price per unit of the product at the time of order.

columns.name: Discount
columns.description: Discount applied to this particular line item, if any.

columns.name: LineTotal
columns.description: Total amount for this line item after discounts.

tables.name: product
tables.description: Contains details of all products available in the store, including pricing, category, and status.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each product.

columns.name: ProductName
columns.description: Official name of the product.

columns.name: ProductCategory
columns.description: Category or classification of the product.

columns.name: LaunchDate
columns.description: Date when the product was launched or made available for sale.

columns.name: Price
columns.description: Current price of the product.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the product is currently available for sale.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Text description or additional information about the product.
